headline: ITW Board of Directors Declares Quarterly Dividend
summary: GLENVIEW, Ill., Feb. 13, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The Board of Directors of Illinois Tool Works Inc. (NYSE: ITW) declared a dividend on the company's common stock of $1.61 per share for the first quarter of 2026. The dividend equates to $6.44 per share on a full-year basis. The dividend will be paid on April 9, 2026 to shareholders of record as of March 31, 2026.
